short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One Vault For All Your Private Data

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
All pass hub  - Free Password Manager

All pass hub browser extension for Chrome gives you organized access to all your
passwords from one secure place. Credential can safely manage passwords for your
accounts, store and autofill your login credentials with one click across numerous
websites, and generate strong passwords for all new logins.

Efficiently manage your passwords in Chrome

The AllPassHub extension provide below feature:
1 Store unlimited passwords, notes, bank details, and any other type of sensitive information without storage restrictions.
2. Autofill your passwords across all websites and applications and improve your overall productivity.
3. Safely share passwords with multiple users.
4. Immediately revoke user access if you want. 
5. Secure your passwords and other sensitive data with AES 256 encryption.
6. Protect your password vault with a strong master password.
